input.sentences: a family met at a local restaurant for dinner | and the grandmother was delighted to spend time with her granddaughter .
dad often took time off of work early to make sure that he was there for dinner | too .
he loved all of his kids with a passion | and he loved that he had a new daughter .
everyone wondered how mom always looked so classy and composed with four young children to take care of .
the aunt and uncle were elated to have some time with the children themselves .
output.sentences: ONE DAY I WOKE UP AND MY DOG KING WAS STARRING AT ME LOOKING LIKE IM READY TO GO THATS HOW I KMOW HE WAS READY TO GO OUTSIDE
PICTURE TIME WITH MY THREE GIRLS TODAY
MY SISTER AND HER DAUGHTER BETH
MY TWO PARENT JEWEL AND JAMES GRANT
